abstract: A skit on "Saturday Night Live" offers a take on the mayor's stance on Occupy Wall Street.
snippet: A skit on "Saturday Night Live" offers a take on the mayor's stance on Occupy Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: New York's billionaire mayor, Michael R. Bloomberg, has tread a careful line in responding to the Occupy Wall Street protest movement - expressing support for the protesters' First Amendment rights, while criticizing their anti-Wall Street message.

headline.main: SNL Suggests What the Mayor Might Say About Protesters
